briefdescription.para: Internal variable that contains whether the Renderer has started or not.
Internal reference to attached viewer node.
Internal reference to the copied viewer node we made in the compilation process.
Error string that can be set in SetError() to handle failures.

detaileddescription.para: Constructing a Renderer object will not start any threads/backend on its own. Use Start() to do this and Stop() when the Renderer is about to be destroyed.
The Renderer owns the buffers that are used in the rendering process and this function sets the kind of buffers to use. The Renderer must be stopped when calling this function.

briefdescription.para: Internal function for generating the cache ID.
Function called when there are frames in the queue to cache.

detaileddescription.para: This function is NOT thread-safe and should only be called in the main thread.

memberdef.argsstring: (NodeDependency dep, qint64 job_time, QByteArray hash, bool texture_existed)
memberdef.name: ThreadCompletedDownload

memberdef.argsstring: (StreamPtr stream, Decoder::RetrieveState state, const TimeRange &path, const rational &stream_time)
memberdef.name: FootageUnavailable

briefdescription.para: A multithreaded OpenGL based renderer for node systems.
